SELECT schemaname, tablename, policyname, cmd, qual, with_check
FROM pg_policies
WHERE schemaname = 'public'
  AND tablename IN ('admin_notifications', 'administrative_divisions', 'anonymous_reports', 'campaign_promises', 'challenge_submissions', 'challenge_votes', 'channels', 'chat_messages', 'chat_participants', 'chat_rooms', 'civic_action_supporters', 'civic_action_updates', 'civic_actions', 'civic_clip_variants', 'civic_clip_views', 'civic_clips', 'civic_impact_scores', 'civic_interests')
  AND (qual LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.role()%'
       OR with_check LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.role()%')
ORDER BY tablename, policyname

SELECT schemaname, tablename, policyname, cmd, qual, with_check
FROM pg_policies
WHERE schemaname = 'public'
  AND tablename IN ('comment_award_assignments', 'comment_awards', 'comment_flairs', 'comment_media', 'comment_media_processing_log', 'comment_moderation_log', 'comment_notifications', 'comment_references', 'comments', 'communities', 'community_active_members', 'community_bookmarks', 'community_events', 'community_flairs', 'community_members', 'community_moderators', 'community_poll_votes', 'community_polls')
  AND (qual LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.role()%'
       OR with_check LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.role()%')
ORDER BY tablename, policyname

SELECT schemaname, tablename, policyname, cmd, qual, with_check
FROM pg_policies
WHERE schemaname = 'public'
  AND tablename IN ('community_rules', 'community_visits', 'contractor_ratings', 'contractors', 'country_governance_templates', 'crisis_reports', 'election_cycles', 'expertise_endorsements', 'feature_flags', 'forum_replies', 'forum_reply_reactions', 'forum_thread_reactions', 'forum_threads', 'government_institutions', 'government_projects', 'hidden_items', 'message_reactions', 'mod_mail_messages')
  AND (qual LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.role()%'
       OR with_check LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.role()%')
ORDER BY tablename, policyname

SELECT schemaname, tablename, policyname, cmd, qual, with_check
FROM pg_policies
WHERE schemaname = 'public'
  AND tablename IN ('mod_mail_threads', 'ngo_partners', 'office_holders', 'official_contacts', 'onboarding_progress', 'post_media', 'posts', 'profile_customizations', 'profiles', 'project_collaborating_institutions', 'project_collaborating_officials', 'project_comments', 'project_updates', 'project_verifications', 'project_views', 'promise_updates', 'promise_verifications', 'rate_limits')
  AND (qual LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.role()%'
       OR with_check LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.role()%')
ORDER BY tablename, policyname

SELECT schemaname, tablename, policyname, cmd, qual, with_check
FROM pg_policies
WHERE schemaname = 'public'
  AND tablename IN ('saved_items', 'sentiment_votes', 'skill_endorsements', 'system_audit_log', 'user_achievements', 'user_actions', 'user_activities', 'user_activity_log', 'user_expertise', 'user_interests', 'user_privacy_settings', 'user_quests', 'user_roles', 'user_skills', 'verification_votes', 'votes')
  AND (qual LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR qual LIKE '%auth.role()%'
       OR with_check LIKE '%auth.uid()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.jwt()%' OR with_check LIKE '%auth.role()%')
ORDER BY tablename, policyname
